title: Sometimes
lyrics:
[intro, kazoo] (Bb) (F) (Gm) (Cm)
 
(Bb) You tell me you're in (F)love with me
(Cm) Like you can't take your (F)pretty eyes away from me
(Bb) It's not that I don't (F)want to stay
(Cm) But everytime you (F)come to close I move away
 
(Cm) I wanna be(F)lieve in everything that you (Bb)say (Dm)
'Cause it sounds (Gm)so good
 
But (Cm)if you really want me, (Bb) move slow
There's (Cm)things about me you just have to (F-stop)know
 
[chorus]
Sometimes I (Bb)run
Sometimes (F)I hide
Sometimes I'm (Cm)scared of you
But (F)all I really want is to (Bb)hold you tight
Treat (F)you right, be with you (Cm)day and night
(F-stop)Baby all I need is time
 
(Bb) I don't wanna (F)be so shy, uh-uh
(Cm) Everytime that (F)I'm alone I wonder why
(Bb) Hope that you will (F)wait for me
(Cm) You'll see that (F)you're the only one for me
 
(Cm) I wanna be(F)lieve in everything that you (Bb)say (Dm)
'Cause it sounds (Gm)so good
 
But (Cm)if you really want me, (Bb) move slow
There's (Cm)things about me you just have to (F-stop)know
 
[chorus]
Sometimes I (Bb)run
Sometimes (F)I hide
Sometimes I'm (Cm)scared of you
But (F)all I really want is to (Bb)hold you tight
Treat (F)you right, be with you (Cm)day and night
 
(F-stop)All I really want is to (Bb)hold you tight
Treat (F)you right, be with you (Cm)day and night
(F)Baby all I need is time
 
(Eb) Just hang around and you'll see
(D) There's nowhere I'd rather be
(Gm) If you love me, (C)trust in me
(Cm) The way that I-(F)-I-I trust in (Bb)you
 
[interlude, kazoo]
(Bb) (F) (Gm) (Cm) Aahhâ€¦ x2
 
[chorus]
(F) Sometimes I (Bb)run
Sometimes (F)I hide
Sometimes I'm (Cm)scared of you
But (F)all I really want is to (Bb)hold you tight
Treat (F)you right, be with you (Cm)day and night
(F) Sometimes I (Bb)run
Sometimes (F)I hide
Sometimes I'm (Cm)scared of you
But (F)all I really want is to (Bb)hold you tight
Treat (F)you right, be with you (Cm)day and night
(F)Baby all I need is time (Bb-single strum) [end]
